name: Hotel Banos de Coamo

reviews.text: Room was spacious and clean, althought bathroom fixtures were a bit ancient (girlfriend didn't like that).
reviews.title: Didn't live up to its billing
My Hotel of Choice when in the Area
reviews.text: It was cool enough at night not to need AC, but still had to listen to the neighbors' AC units.

aka: Parador Banos De Coamo Puerto Rico
